Sequence of the command Change.label: SequenceChange
Sequence of the command Change.example:
// Sequence of the command Change

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
Message: Text=[CastName] ; Priority=1 ; Title=True
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_FORWARD
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 1 ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_BACK
EndThread
WaitMove: Char=Caster
EffectPoint: Char=AllTargets ; Type=Effect
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=Idle

Fire__Single.label: PlayerSequence
Fire__Single.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Fire__Single

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
	EndThread
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_8}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_9}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: TargetLoop=True ; Chain=True ; Sync=True
		LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=False
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
		PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
		Wait: Time=10
	EndThread
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_9}; Reflect=True
EndThread
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_10}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_11}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

// Player sequence of SFX Burning_Oil

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster

StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster

		Channel
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
	EndThread
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_8}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_9}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: TargetLoop=True ; Chain=True ; Sync=True

		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
		PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
		Wait: Time=10
	EndThread
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_9}; Reflect=True
EndThread

WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True

	WaitMove: Char=Caster

Demi__Multi.label: PlayerSequence
Demi__Multi.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Demi__Multi

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
	Channel
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	StopChannel
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
EndThread
PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_6}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster
Demi__Multi.example:
// Player sequence of SFX Demi__Multi

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_FORWARD
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text=[CastName] ; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
LoadSFX: SFX=Demi__Multi ; Reflect=True
StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_IDLE_TO_CHANT
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_CHANT ; Loop=True
	Channel
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX=Demi__Multi ; Reflect=True
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	StopChannel
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_MAGIC
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_ITEM1
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX=Demi__Multi ; Reflect=True
EndThread
PlaySFX: SFX=Demi__Multi ; Reflect=True
WaitSFXDone: SFX=Demi__Multi ; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_BACK
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=Idle
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

// Player sequence of SFX Bio__Multi

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster

StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
	Channel
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	StopChannel
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
EndThread
PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_6}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread

WaitTurn: Char=Caster

Protect.label: PlayerSequence
Protect.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Protect

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
	EndThread
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_8}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_9}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: TargetLoop=True ; Chain=True ; Sync=True
		LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=False
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
		PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
		Wait: Time=10
	EndThread
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_9}; Reflect=True
EndThread
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_10}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_11}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

// Player sequence of SFX Heavy

	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread

	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster

		Channel

		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster

	EndThread
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
EndThread

	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True

		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_8}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_9}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: TargetLoop=True ; Chain=True ; Sync=True

		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
		PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
		Wait: Time=10
	EndThread
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_9}; Reflect=True
EndThread

WaitReflect

	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_10}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster

Phoenix_Rebirth_Flame.label: PlayerSequence
Phoenix_Rebirth_Flame.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Phoenix_Rebirth_Flame

StartThread: Condition=CasterHP == 0
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
	SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
	Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=CasterHP != 0
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
		MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
		WaitMove: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
		Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
	EndThread
	Message: Text={text_2}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
	SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
	Channel
	SetBackgroundIntensity: Intensity=0 ; Time=12
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	StopChannel
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
	ActivateReflect
	WaitReflect
	StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
		MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitMove: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
	WaitTurn: Char=Caster
EndThread

Bahamut__Full.label: PlayerSequence
Bahamut__Full.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Bahamut__Full

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
Channel
SetBackgroundIntensity: Intensity=0 ; Time=12
WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StopChannel
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_5}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster
Bahamut__Full.example:
// Player sequence of SFX Bahamut__Full

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_FORWARD
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text=[CastName] ; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
LoadSFX: SFX=Bahamut__Full ; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_IDLE_TO_CHANT
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_CHANT ; Loop=True
Channel
SetBackgroundIntensity: Intensity=0 ; Time=12
WaitSFXLoaded: SFX=Bahamut__Full ; Reflect=True
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StopChannel
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_MAGIC
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlaySFX: SFX=Bahamut__Full ; Reflect=True
WaitSFXDone: SFX=Bahamut__Full ; Reflect=True
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_BACK
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=Idle
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

Frog_Drop.label: PlayerSequence
Frog_Drop.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Frog_Drop

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
	EndThread
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_8}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_9}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: TargetLoop=True ; Chain=True ; Sync=True
		LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=False
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
		PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
		Wait: Time=10
	EndThread
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_9}; Reflect=True
EndThread
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_10}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_11}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

Special_Flee.label: PlayerSequence
Special_Flee.example:
// Player sequence of SFX Special_Flee

LoadSFX: SFX=Special_Flee
WaitSFXLoaded: SFX=Special_Flee
PlaySFX: SFX=Special_Flee
WaitSFXDone: SFX=Special_Flee

Special_Flee.label: Sequence
Special_Flee.body:
// Shared sequence of SFX Special_Flee

PlaySound: Sound=2444
PlaySound: Sound=2445
PlaySound: Sound=2446
StartThread: TargetLoop=True
	StartThread: Condition=TargetIsPlayer
		MoveToPosition: Char=AllTargets ; RelativePosition=(0.0, 0.0, -4048.0) ; Time=21
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=!TargetIsPlayer
		Turn: Char=AllTargets ; BaseAngle=Default ; Angle=180 ; Time=6
		MoveToPosition: Char=AllTargets ; RelativePosition=(0.0, 0.0, 4048.0) ; Time=21
	EndThread
EndThread
Wait: Time=18
EffectPoint: Char=AllTargets ; Type=Effect
EffectPoint: Char=Everyone ; Type=Figure
ShowMesh: Char=AllTargets ; Enable=False

Special_Prepare_Attack.label: PlayerSequence
Special_Prepare_Attack.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Special_Prepare_Attack

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
Channel
WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StopChannel
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True

Devour.label: PlayerSequence
Devour.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Devour

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
	EndThread
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_8}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_9}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: TargetLoop=True ; Chain=True ; Sync=True
		LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=False
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
		PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
		Wait: Time=10
	EndThread
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_9}; Reflect=True
EndThread
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_10}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_11}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

Medeo.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Medeo

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
	Channel
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	StopChannel
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
EndThread
PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_6}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_IDLE_TO_CHANT

	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_CHANT ; Loop=True
	Channel
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX=Medeo ; Reflect=True
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	StopChannel
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_MAGIC
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_ITEM1
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX=Medeo ; Reflect=True
EndThread

Chestnut.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Chestnut

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
	EndThread
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_8}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_9}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: TargetLoop=True ; Chain=True ; Sync=True
		LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=False
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
		PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
		Wait: Time=10
	EndThread
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_9}; Reflect=True
EndThread
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect

	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_10}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread

Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5

Fire_Blades.label: PlayerSequence
Fire_Blades.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Fire_Blades

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
SetBackgroundIntensity: Intensity=0.5 ; Time=20
LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
	Channel
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	StopChannel
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
EndThread
PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_6}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=Idle
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

Ramuh__Short.label: PlayerSequence
Ramuh__Short.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Ramuh__Short

StartThread: Condition=CommandId != 57
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
		MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
		WaitMove: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
		Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
	EndThread
	Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
	SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
	Channel
	SetBackgroundIntensity: Intensity=0.5 ; Time=20
	ShowMesh: Enable=False ; Time=16 ; Char=AllNonTargets
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	StopChannel
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	ActivateReflect
	WaitReflect
	StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
		MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitMove: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
	WaitTurn: Char=Caster
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
ElseThread
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
	Message: Text={text_2}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
	SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
	ActivateReflect
	WaitReflect
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
EndThread

Revive__Multi.label: PlayerSequence
Revive__Multi.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Revive__Multi

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
Channel
WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StopChannel
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_5}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster
Revive__Multi.example:
// Player sequence of SFX Revive__Multi

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_FORWARD
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text=[CastName] ; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
LoadSFX: SFX=Revive__Multi ; Reflect=True
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_IDLE_TO_CHANT
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_CHANT ; Loop=True
Channel
WaitSFXLoaded: SFX=Revive__Multi ; Reflect=True
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StopChannel
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_MAGIC
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlaySFX: SFX=Revive__Multi ; Reflect=True
WaitSFXDone: SFX=Revive__Multi ; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_BACK
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=Idle
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

Odin__Short.label: PlayerSequence
Odin__Short.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Odin__Short

StartThread: Condition=CommandId != 57
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
		MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
		WaitMove: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
		Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
	EndThread
	Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
	SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
	Channel
	//ShowMesh: Enable=False ; Time=16 ; Char=AllNonTargets
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	StopChannel
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	ActivateReflect
	WaitReflect
	StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
		MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitMove: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
	WaitTurn: Char=Caster
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
ElseThread
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
	Message: Text={text_2}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
	SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
	ActivateReflect
	WaitReflect
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
EndThread

Dust_Storm.label: PlayerSequence
Dust_Storm.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Dust_Storm

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
	EndThread
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_8}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_9}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: TargetLoop=True ; Chain=True ; Sync=True
		LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=False
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
		PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
		Wait: Time=10
	EndThread
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_9}; Reflect=True
EndThread
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_10}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_11}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

Ark__Short.label: PlayerSequence
Ark__Short.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Ark__Short

StartThread: Condition=CommandId != 57
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
		MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
		WaitMove: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
		Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
	EndThread
	Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
	SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
	Channel
	ShowMesh: Enable=False ; Time=16 ; Char=AllNonTargets
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	StopChannel
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	ActivateReflect
	WaitReflect
	StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
		MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitMove: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
	WaitTurn: Char=Caster
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
ElseThread
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
	Message: Text={text_2}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
	SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
	ActivateReflect
	WaitReflect
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
EndThread

		MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_FORWARD
		WaitMove: Char=Caster
	EndThread

	EndThread

	SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
	LoadSFX: SFX=Ark__Short ; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_IDLE_TO_CHANT
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_CHANT ; Loop=True
	Channel
	ShowMesh: Enable=False ; Time=16 ; Char=AllNonTargets
	WaitSFXLoaded: SFX=Ark__Short ; Reflect=True
	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	StopChannel

	WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	PlaySFX: SFX=Ark__Short ; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX=Ark__Short ; Reflect=True

	WaitReflect
	StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True

		WaitMove: Char=Caster

	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True

	WaitReflect
	SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
EndThread

// Player sequence of SFX Ragtime_Correct

	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_5}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
	EndThread
	PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_5}; Reflect=True
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=!IsSingleTarget ; Sync=True
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId == 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_7}; Loop=True
		Channel
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
		StopChannel
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_8}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: Condition=ItemUseId != 255 ; Sync=True
		PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_9}
		WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
	EndThread
	StartThread: TargetLoop=True ; Chain=True ; Sync=True
		LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_6}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=False
		WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_7}; Reflect=True
		PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_8}; Reflect=True
		Wait: Time=10
	EndThread
	WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_9}; Reflect=True
EndThread
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_10}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread

Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5

Special_Necron_Teleport.label: PlayerSequence
Special_Necron_Teleport.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Special_Necron_Teleport

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_1}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}; Loop=True
Channel
WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StopChannel
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
MoveToPosition: Char=AllTargets ; AbsolutePosition=Default ; MoveHeight=True ; Time=0
ShowMesh: Char=AllTargets ; Enable=True ; IsDisappear=True
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

Grand_Cross.label: PlayerSequence
Grand_Cross.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Grand_Cross

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
Channel
WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StopChannel
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_5}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

// Player sequence of SFX Grand_Cross

StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_FORWARD
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text=[CastName] ; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
LoadSFX: SFX=Grand_Cross ; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_IDLE_TO_CHANT
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster

Fenrir_Wind__Short.label: PlayerSequence
Fenrir_Wind__Short.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Fenrir_Wind__Short

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
Channel
SetBackgroundIntensity: Intensity=0.5 ; Time=20
ShowMesh: Enable=False ; Time=16 ; Char=AllNonTargets
WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StopChannel
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_5}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True

	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_FORWARD
	WaitMove: Char=Caster

StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5

Message: Text=[CastName] ; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True

LoadSFX: SFX=Fenrir_Wind__Short ; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True

PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_CHANT ; Loop=True
Channel
SetBackgroundIntensity: Intensity=0.5 ; Time=20
ShowMesh: Enable=False ; Time=16 ; Char=AllNonTargets
WaitSFXLoaded: SFX=Fenrir_Wind__Short ; Reflect=True
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StopChannel
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_MAGIC
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlaySFX: SFX=Fenrir_Wind__Short ; Reflect=True
WaitSFXDone: SFX=Fenrir_Wind__Short ; Reflect=True
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_BACK
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=Idle
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

Phoenix__Short.label: PlayerSequence
Phoenix__Short.body:
// Player sequence of SFX Phoenix__Short

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim={anim_1}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text={text_1}; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
LoadSFX: SFX={sfx_1}; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_2}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_3}; Loop=True
Channel
SetBackgroundIntensity: Intensity=0.5 ; Time=20
ShowMesh: Enable=False ; Time=16 ; Char=AllPlayers
WaitSFXLoaded: SFX={sfx_2}; Reflect=True
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StopChannel
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_4}
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlaySFX: SFX={sfx_3}; Reflect=True
WaitSFXDone: SFX={sfx_4}; Reflect=True
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim={anim_5}
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim={anim_6}
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster
Phoenix__Short.example:
// Player sequence of SFX Phoenix__Short

WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=&65533 ; Reflect=True
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, 400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_FORWARD
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
StartThread: Condition=IsSingleSelectedTarget
	Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=AllTargets ; Time=5
EndThread
Message: Text=[CastName] ; Priority=1 ; Title=True ; Reflect=True
SetupReflect: Delay=SFXLoaded
LoadSFX: SFX=Phoenix__Short ; Reflect=True ; UseCamera=True
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_IDLE_TO_CHANT
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_CHANT ; Loop=True
Channel
SetBackgroundIntensity: Intensity=0.5 ; Time=20
ShowMesh: Enable=False ; Time=16 ; Char=AllPlayers
WaitSFXLoaded: SFX=Phoenix__Short ; Reflect=True
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
StopChannel
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=MP_MAGIC
WaitAnimation: Char=Caster
PlaySFX: SFX=Phoenix__Short ; Reflect=True
WaitSFXDone: SFX=Phoenix__Short ; Reflect=True
SetVariable: Variable=cmd_status ; Value=|2 ; Reflect=True
ActivateReflect
WaitReflect
StartThread: Condition=CasterRow == 0 && AreCasterAndSelectedTargetsEnemies ; Sync=True
	MoveToPosition: Char=Caster ; RelativePosition=(0, 0, -400) ; Anim=MP_STEP_BACK
	WaitMove: Char=Caster
EndThread
PlayAnimation: Char=Caster ; Anim=Idle
Turn: Char=Caster ; BaseAngle=Default ; Time=5
WaitTurn: Char=Caster

Phoenix__Short.label: Sequence
Phoenix__Short.body:
// Shared sequence of SFX Phoenix__Short

SetBackgroundIntensity: Intensity=0.5 ; Time=4
ShowMesh: Char=MatchingCondition(IsPlayer == CasterIsPlayer) ; Enable=False ; IsDisappear=True
StartThread: Condition=SFXUseCamera && !CasterIsPlayer
	ShiftWorld: Angle=(0, 180, 0)
EndThread
PlaySound: Sound=2933
PlaySound: Sound=2934
PlaySound: Sound=2935
PlaySound: Sound=2936
SetBackgroundIntensity: Intensity=0.4296875 ; Time=12 ; HoldDuration=163
Wait: Time=38
PlaySound: Sound=2937
PlaySound: Sound=2938
PlaySound: Sound=2939
PlaySound: Sound=2940
Wait: Time=33
ShowMesh: Char=MatchingCondition(IsPlayer != CasterIsPlayer) ; Enable=False ; IsDisappear=True
Wait: Time=88
ShowMesh: Char=MatchingCondition(IsPlayer == CasterIsPlayer) ; Enable=True ; IsDisappear=True
ShowMesh: Char=MatchingCondition(IsPlayer == CasterIsPlayer) ; Enable=True ; Time=12
Wait: Time=3
ShowMesh: Char=MatchingCondition(IsPlayer != CasterIsPlayer) ; Enable=True ; IsDisappear=True
EffectPoint: Char=AllTargets ; Type=Effect
Wait: Time=1
SetBackgroundIntensity: Intensity=1 ; Time=12
Wait: Time=16
EffectPoint: Char=Everyone ; Type=Figure
Wait: Time=8
StartThread: Condition=SFXUseCamera && !CasterIsPlayer
	ShiftWorld: Angle=(0, 0, 0)
EndThread
